title: New: WESLEE – Bathwater
body:
**WESLEE’**s debut track, _Gassed_, became somewhat of a viral hit earlier this year – clocking up an impressive seven figure streaming numbers on Spotify.

Still keeping their identity under wraps, the bi-coastal pop duo have now followed up their debut with second offering, Bathwater. As equally radio ready as Gassed, this is how I imagine Oh Wonder covering Prince might sound, there’s a real elegant funk to it. Check it out below.
